Articles.Content:
Your challenge is to create a craft for Shoot For The Mun EnterprisesTM that is as compact as possible. NOT MINIMALISTIC. All super simple crafts shall be disqualified from the running, the aim of this competition is to get as much capability into as small a space as possible.

Let\'s see what you come up with! Here\'s one I\'ve made, just a prototype...

Unique I is capable of sending Kerbals to the Mun and back.

SFTM EnterprisesTM is not responsible for any mental or physical trauma caused by this challenge, including (but not limited to) the annoyance of debris left in LKO.

The original challenge of this thread was to take Unique I to a moon and back, I just changed it to something more interesting. If you can follow in my footsteps like that, then do!
